Class EdgeArrowColorTransformer<E>

java.lang.Object

Type Parameters:
E - Edge
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.commons.collections15.Transformer<E,java.awt.Paint>
public class EdgeArrowColorTransformer<E>
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.commons.collections15.Transformer<E,java.awt.Paint>

This transformer defines the color of the interactions of the graph visualizations.

Author:
Thomas Schaffter (firstname.name@gmail.com)
